quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: Because without someone named, it feels like my case can just fall between the cracks.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: Yes, that’s exactly why I keep stressing it to them. It’s not acceptable.

quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: And if it falls between the cracks, that’s my safety at risk.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: I completely understand that, and I’ve highlighted it to them, but they haven’t given me a name yet.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: They haven’t responded with the detail, yes.

contradictions.issue: Ben highlights risk to safety if case falls between cracks; Emma concedes systemic failure but no resolution
